clusterList.phrase: whenever we've had people come to us after automobile accidents the most common thing is someone shows up looking for them

they told me that she had been involved in an accident and i interrupted the deputy because i then remembered that message that came across the screen and that was the and that was the first time then that i knew
we always see someone who was texting or calling who would not have been in that accident had it not been for the phone
among teens and young adults in particular who are arriving in emergency departments with serious and sometimes fatal injuries because they were not paying attention while texting
